resources.string:
Hello, my name is Matheus, but you can call me Matt. 
I love robots and science. 
I'm creating a robot that shoots Nerf darts automatically when someone enters my room without my permission. 
It sounds scary, but I swear it's for scientific purpose only (or security ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤£). 
After this, I'll create a replica of GLADOS based on the game Portal 2. For those who have played, it really sounds scary. 
I also enjoy jet engines.
